data.title: British Comedy Guide
meta_keywords: Russell Brand British comedy work Actor Writer Stand-up comedian
data.meta_description: Russell Brand is an English stand-up comedian, actor and presenter who rose to fame in the 2000s for his flamboyant, overly loquacious style and manner. He has presented numerous television, radio series and podcasts; starred in a number of British and Hollywood films; and toured to great success. A Sunday Times report in September 2023 accused Brand of rape, sexual assaults and emotional abuse.
data.text:
Russell Brand is an English stand-up comedian, actor and presenter who rose to fame in the 2000s for his flamboyant, overly loquacious style and manner. He has presented numerous television, radio series and podcasts; starred in a number of British and Hollywood films; and toured to great success. A Sunday Times report in September 2023 accused Brand of rape, sexual assaults and emotional abuse.

Correct/update this page
